unnormalised: Urban planning in India needs a holistic approach, integrating environmental sustainability. Consider the Yamuna's rejuvenation in Delhi. The 74th Constitutional Amendment Act, 1992, aimed at decentralization, but implementation lags. Focus on affordable housing, especially post-COVID-19. Mumbai's infrastructure challenges require innovative solutions, starting 10/10/2024. Review the Master Plan 2041 at 14:00 hrs, 26/01/2025.
normalised: Urban planning in India needs a holistic approach, integrating environmental sustainability. Consider the Yamuna's rejuvenation in Delhi. The seventy fourth Constitutional Amendment Act, one thousand nine hundred and ninety two, aimed at decentralization, but implementation lags. Focus on affordable housing, especially post COVID nineteen. Mumbai's infrastructure challenges require innovative solutions, starting tenth october two thousand and twenty four. Review the Master Plan two thousand and forty one at two P M, twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty five.
